# Soft [Attention](Attention.qmd)
- For a simple [Seq2Seq](Seq2Seq.qmd), all hidden state vectors $h_t$ across timesteps are linearly combined
- $$c_i = \Sigma_{j=1}^T \alpha_{ij} h_j$$
- $$a_{ij} = \frac{exp(e_{ij})}{\Sigma_{k=1}^T exp(e_{ij})}$$
